ygData.subject: Re: Arrival
ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: She looked at Zardus. Happened? She had to think a second about the events that took place. Well, I went out to help you, and she came after me.

Squizzy::

She looked at Zardus. "Happened?" She had to think a second about the 
events that took place. "Well, I went out to help you, and she came 
after me. She got me with something, and that's the last that I 
remember. I don't know why she attacked me. Do you?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Squizzy is in the Iron Fist, no the Alliance base.
> 
> ::FZ (the other Zardus)::
> 
> Zardus' other self looks up as he heard movement, his proccessor 
> getting info from the Iron Fist.
> 
> He stands up, walking to the CR _tank_ that Squizzy was in.
> 
> "Welcome back," he says, "What happened back there with Lady Hawk?"
> 
>
